transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Ji, Neeraj ji, miche Agarwal bol raha hun, senior manager baat kar raha hun India Mart se, kaise ho aap?
Customer: Yaar aap kitne senior manager hain?
Executive: Sir, mera aap se baat hua tha.
Customer: Aapka abhi to ghante aadha ghante pehle to senior manager kaha gaya.
Executive: Abhimanyu ka call aapke paas aaya hoga na, Abhimanyu ka?
Hmm?
Executive: Aapki baat jo hui hogi, Abhimanyu se baat hui hogi na aapki Abhimanyu se?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Haan to Abhimanyu hi mere paas request leke aaye the ki sir ek baar aap baat kar lo, aapki bhi baat kiya tha isliye maine aapko call kiya hai sir.
Executive: To sir kya naam hai aapka jo concern hai wo abhi bhi pending hai ya fir khatam ho chuka hai sir aapka concern?
Customer: Kya concern?
Executive: Main puch raha hun ki sir abhi kya issue aa raha hai, main ab kya issue aa raha hai to mere ko ye batao. Maine aapko us din bhi main Abhimanyu ko bol ke aapko.
Customer: Ek saal ke baad aap ye sab aap ek saal ke baad active ho gaye ye sab puchne ke liye. Ek saal tak wo Harish Agarwal ko aapne bataya uske pehle dusra tha usko bataya ye Rahul ko bataya aur ek mahine se lekin koi sahi kaam hi nahi kiya to fir hamara kya ye aapka platform jo hai wo aapko service dena tha. Uske liye to paisa liya aap logon ne.
Executive: Ji.
Hmm.
Executive: Sir, main wahi aapko maine last week bhi bola thi ek baat ki sir main aapki aankhon ke aage pura catalog sahi kar ke de dunga, Abhimanyu ko hi maine bola ki video meeting pe la ke client se paise mat mangna, sir servicing ki baat karna aur jo bhi catalog ke andar kami hai puri sahi kar ke dena client ko.
Customer: Nahi abhi abhi bhi aap log kya phone aata hai kisi ka bhi to har baar wahi bolte hain ki abhi aisa hoga abhi nahi hoga abhi aapko aayega. Abhi tak whatsapp pe koi lead nahi aa rahi thi. Abhi parso Rahul ne bheji pure saal mein koi nahi aayi.
Executive: Sir lead to dekho available hoti hai aisi baat nahi hai lead agar platform khula hai India Mart ka to lead ke liye khula hua hai sir. Agar hum log promote kar rahe hain kisi client se paisa liya to.
Customer: Aapne bataya tha ki wo whatsapp pe whatsapp pe aapko milegi to wo to mili nahi pure saal.
Executive: Sir whatsapp pe to dekho hum log personally bhejte hain kyunki account manager bhejta hai, theek hai. Lekin jo aapka mobile app hai aur jo aapki email id registered India Mart pe us pe to sir real time mein aapke paas aata hai sir.
Customer: Yani abhi hum kahin pe bhi kahin pe bhi busy hai kahin pe hain hum log ek ghante ke baad dekhenge to lead expire ho gayi. Ek ghante ki baat chodiye ek minute bhi wo mail mujhe aaya aur main open kar raha hun to lead expire aa rahi hai.
Executive: Lead expire ho gaya, bilkul sir main aapki baat ko mana nahi kar raha aur kya hai ki abhi maine jo dala tha Borosil ka vacuum pump to uske badle jitne bhi pure India mein vacuum pump ke parts kisi ko chahiye vacuum pump banane wale 200 manufacturer honge to wo sab ka aa raha hai mere ko to koi matlab hi nahi na mere ko mere maine maine aapke yahan pe register karwaya tha Borosil vacuum pump aisa aap dekhiye jo item code hai fir bottle top dispenser Borosil ka to fir alag alag wahi aa jayega plastic ka dispenser ka inquiry aata hai wo to bekar hi hai na matlab hi nahi na mera concern nahi hai to fir cheez.
Executive: Sir Borosil ek brand ho gayi na sir.
Customer: Matlab jo brand ka hum aapko listing karwa rahe hain jo catalog mein mention kiya to wahi brand ka aana chahiye na humko inquiry. Sir client jo hai na abhi jaise ki wahan pe jaise ki hamare ko shoes chahiye client ko theek hai. Ab ek cheez batao kisi ko agar Adidas lena hoga sir theek hai shoes ka wo India Mart pe kya karega Adidas ko phone karega Adidas ki website pe jayega.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir aapko theek hai. Haan kya bata rahe hain aap wapis bataiye. Aapke aapke liye India Mart worth hai uske liye nahi hai na. India Mart pe inquiry aap suno agar kisi ko shoes lena hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Agar mere ko shoes lene hain 100 piece lene hain tab to main India Mart pe apni requirement dalunga ki I want to purchase 100 piece of shoes, theek hai. Wo shoes koi bhi ho sakte hain casual ho sports ho formal ho loafer ho koi bhi ho sakte hain.
Customer: Haan sir hum hum hum bina karan wo time kyun magad rahe hain humko aap aapko Adidas chahiye to Adidas hi wo dekhna rahega na. To main main Borosil ka rakh raha hun product to mujhe Borosil ka hi inquiry aana chahiye na. Aap aap dusri dusra dusra kyun bhej dete ho mere ko?
Executive: Sir maine aapko ye bataya ye ki bhai Borosil ka kisi ka inquiry aata hai to wahi mere ko divert kijiye. Aur aur kyun mere ko bhej rahe ho?
Executive: Sir wahi keh raha hun ki agar koi client hai wahan pe dalta hai niche usko Borosil chahiye. To client nahi dalta hai to aapka aapka aapka system se wo hona chahiye na.
Executive: Sir wahi to aap jo bhi jo bhi aaya wo sab bhej denge aur humne lead diya aapko wahi bolenge uska kya matlab hai?
Executive: Sir client wahan pe likhta nahi hai Borosil chahiye usko to wo product ka naam dalta hai wo brand name nahi dalta wo product ka naam dalta hai sir. Yahi main samjhana chah raha hun main aapse ki agar hamare portal pe shoes ki requirement aa rahi hai na to hum log wahan pe shoes ki category dalenge hum log sir wahan pe ye nahi dalenge Adidas shoes ya fir Reebok shoes.
Customer: Nahi to wo banda to hume fir wo pure din wahi open kar ke check karna rahega wo to wo koi sir koi aapki hai na agar aap kisi showroom mein gaye AC lene ke liye aapne man bana liya abhi abhi abhi short mein baat kar lijiye sir aapki expectation ko change kar dete hain wo kehte hain ki aap Hitachi le lo ya carrier le lo ya fir aap higher ka le lo uske andar hum aapko ye specification denge. To wo bhi hamara mind change kar dete hain na. To agar aapke paas inquiry abhi baat short mein kijiye abhi kya karna hai aap phone kiye hain kya wajah se hai main abhi mere sath baithe hain bhai.
Hmm.
Executive: Sir main to wahi keh raha ki sir ek to aapka concern raise ho rakha hai India Mart pe aur dusra main chah raha tha ki sir apna ho jaye sir India Mart se dobara se aapko service mein koi kami nahi aayegi is baar sir ye main aapko bol raha hun.
Customer: To iske liye kya karna padega sir? To fir aap aap abhi maine ek saal maine advance diya barabar aap abhi ek saal kami koi nahi aayegi aap guarantee kar rahe hain to ek saal ke baad payment.
Executive: Ek aur cheez aap ek aur cheez aap paisa ek ek din ke baad de dena aap video meeting pe aa jao main Abhimanyu ko bol deta hun wo catalog aapka pura sahi kar ke de dega sir aapko aur batao.
Customer: Nahi wahi abhi paisa aapko aap ek saal ke baad dijiyega aapko aapko to aapke upar bharosa hai na service dene ke liye.
Executive: Haan to main wahi to keh raha hun aapka catalog aapke samne theek kar dete hain video meeting pe paisa do din ke baad de dena aap aur batao.
Customer: Nahi do din ke baad kyun do din ke baad wahi hoga na wo bhi wo bhi aisa wo teen din ke baad liya tha aap to ek din do din.
Executive: Sir 14 tarikh tak hi keh raha hun sir kyunki 14 tarikh ki last date thi service ki aaj 18 tarikh ho gayi 14 15 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 tak chalega aapka profile kyunki saat din extra chala diya hum log profile. Aap 21 tak.
Customer: Nahi to abhi main kaha main kaha aapko force kiya hun kahin aapko kaha force kiya hun?
Executive: Are main bhai main sir ji force ki nahi keh raha main to waise hi aapko bata raha hun ki aapka kaam karwa ke dunga catalog ke upar bina paise liye.
Customer: Pehle bhi wahi baat kiya tha aap log ne aap log ne wahi baat kiya tha ki hum ye karenge aapko ye karwa denge ye kar denge pura saal to aapne aap log ne paisa to le raha hun pehle karwa ke hi paise lunga aapse pura saal aapne maza kiya pura saal sab aap kya hai ki aapke client koi ban gaye to paisa le liya maza kar diya ek saal abhi saal khatam hua tabhi maloom padta hai aap log ko ki abhi wo wapis nahi aayega. Aap abhi ek saal do service hume aur fir hum de denge payment aapko. Ek saal nahi chalo che mahina do che mahina ke baad aap le lena. Sir wo bina amount humne to bharosa kar ke ek saal ka payment de diya aapne kuch bharosa tod diya.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi ki inquiry nahi di inquiry di hai buyleads di hai aapko aisi baat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Chaliye aap abhi abhi abhi har roz mat phone kijiye aapko agar karna hai kaam to aap kisi ko personally hamare yahan pe samne bhej dijiye theek hai sir. Sir aap video meeting pe hi ho payegi jo bhi decision hogi video meeting pe ho payegi.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi abhi abhi time nahi hai abhi main aapka call nahi lunga aap aapke koi sales wale bande ko bhej do yahan pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer says no leads received on WhatsApp.

- Customer says leads expire too quickly.

- Customer says no proper service after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to fix catalog via video meeting.

- Executive offered payment after service satisfaction.

- Executive mentioned buyleads are available.

- Executive mentioned profile will run till 21st.



Next Steps: 

- Customer asked to send sales person.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, service
